from mcp.server import Server
import inspect
s = Server\(''test''\)
print\(''Server methods with tool in name:''\)
for attr in dir\(s\):
    if ''tool'' in attr.lower\(\):
        print\(f''  {attr}: {getattr\(s, attr\)}''\)
        
print\(\)
print\(''Let\\''s check if there are decorators in mcp:''\)
from mcp import __all__ if hasattr\(__import__\(''mcp''\), ''__all__''\) else dir\(__import__\(''mcp''\)\)
import mcp
print\([x for x in dir\(mcp\) if ''tool'' in x.lower\(\)]\)
")

Bash(py -3.14 -c "
from mcp.server import Server
import inspect

# Check if there are any decorators or methods to register tools
s = Server\(''test''\)
print\(''Methods that might be related to tool registration:''\)
for attr_name in dir\(s\):
    if not attr_name.startswith\(''_''\):
        attr = getattr\(s, attr_name\)
        if callable\(attr\):
            print\(f''  {attr_name}: {attr}''\)
")
